forecast-period.text: Wind gusts can be 40 percent stronger than the averages given here. Wind warnings are issued for today and tomorrow and describe the highest category of wind warning for that day.

Winds: Variable 5 to 10 knots, then southwesterly afternoon sea breezes 5 to 10 knots, tending southeasterly in the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: West to southwesterly below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy. 30% chance of a shower during the morning and afternoon.

Winds: East to southeasterly about 10 knots tending west to southwesterly 10 to 15 knots in the afternoon, turning south to southeasterly in the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: West to southwesterly below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny.

Winds: Southeasterly 10 to 15 knots tending easterly during the morning then becoming southwesterly 5 to 10 knots during the afternoon before becoming southeasterly in the evening. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: West to southwesterly below 0.5 metres. Weather: Mostly sunny.
Winds: Variable 5 to 10 knots. Seas: Below 1 metre. Swell: West to southwesterly below 0.5 metres. Weather: Partly cloudy.
